metadata.title: CVE-2019-14433 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in OpenStack Nova before 17.0.12, 18.x before18.2.2, and 19.x before 19.0.2. If an API request from an authenticateduser ends in a fault condition due to an external exception, details of theunderlying environment may be leaked in the response, and could includesensitive configuration or other data.

criterions.comment: nova: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
